segments.text: I've known from your resume that you are a college graduate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , madam . I graduated from Tianjin College of Finance and Trade three years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you take as your major in college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took Accounting as my major .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of work were you in charge of in the previous company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was in charge of cost price and sales revenue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , I see . Why do you want to work for a Sino-American joint venture enterprise now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are two reasons for me to do it . First , I'm sure that there will be more opportunities for advancement If I enter your enterprise . Secondly , I'd like to acquaint myself with American culture if possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , Mr . Zhang , you must know , what we need is a capable accountant , and we won't have enough time to tell him some other things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , madam . I know that I'll be expected , first of all , to work hard if I'm hired .
segments.speaker: S2
